name: HOT876RADIO
0:
”Alexa, open hot radio online”
”Alexa, start hot radio online”
”Alexa, ask hot radio online what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hot radio online
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hot 876 radio is a Reggae,Dancehall radio station with the purpose of keeping music Alive. 
We bring you the latest music straight out of Jamaica,we play hits ofter hits for our listeners.
Live music 24/7 everyday online,please join us and subscribe to our channel to stay update.
Download the app from the apple store ,play store or listen to us on tunein radio and youtube. 
Bring you music from the 80's 90's 2000,till today's hits,enjoy our station and feel the positive vibe.
Enjoy us at work in your car at home on the road while you exercise,when you chilling with friends.
We believe that we offer our listeners the best music, we proudly say our music that we play on our radio station is suitable for everyone.No matter where in the world you are we play the best hits.
We have live talk show were you can reach out to us,share your views on the latest topics,trending.
